glsa.title: cURL: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in cURL, the worst of which may allow attackers to bypass intended restrictions.

background.p: cURL is a tool and libcurl is a library for transferring data with URL syntax.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in cURL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Remote attackers could cause a Denial of Service condition, obtain sensitive information, or bypass intended restrictions for TLS sessions.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All cURL users should upgrade to the latest version:
